name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】「 Outside the Box 」Nanashi Mumei Birthday Celebration 2024 【#MoomsDay3DLIVE】 [gl7CwlEg2ZI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Nanashi Mumei performs the song 'Seiren naru Heretics'.
Transition between songs with atmospheric visual effects.

subtitles.original: …真っ向喰うを
subtitles.english: …devouring it head-on

subtitles.original: いつか愛を連れ出して　不甲斐ないから及びを捨てて
subtitles.english:
Someday I'll lead love away,
since I'm pathetic, I'll cast away my reach

subtitles.original: 大体　痛み回って　私は解くから
subtitles.english:
Pain mostly circulates,
since I will solve it

subtitles.original: 愛を探して　巡る本気　星を追って
subtitles.english:
Searching for love,
chasing the serious stars as they turn

subtitles.original: 泣いた日々がまた　重んで消えようとしても
subtitles.english:
Even if the days I cried pile up
and try to disappear again

subtitles.original: まだ終われないから
subtitles.english: Because it's not over yet

subtitles.original: また焔が立ち昇り出す
subtitles.english: The flames begin to rise again

subtitles.original: いつか曖昧なままで　なくしたイメージの中へ
subtitles.english:
Someday, remaining ambiguous,
into the lost image

subtitles.original: だいたい光待って　私は焦がすから
subtitles.english:
Mostly waiting for the light,
since I will scorch it

subtitles.original: 愛を探して　巡る本気　星を追って
subtitles.english:
Searching for love,
chasing the serious stars as they turn

subtitles.original: 繋いだ手はまた　ずっと放さないまま
subtitles.english:
The hands we joined,
I won't let go of them for a long time

subtitles.original: 愛を連れ出して　不甲斐ないから及びを捨てて
subtitles.english:
Taking love away,
since I'm pathetic, I'll cast away my reach

subtitles.original: 大体　痛み回って　私は解くから
subtitles.english:
Pain mostly circulates,
since I will solve it

subtitles.original: 愛を探して　巡る本気　星を追って
subtitles.english:
Searching for love,
chasing the serious stars as they turn

subtitles.original: 泣いた日々がまた　重んで消えようとしても
subtitles.english:
Even if the days I cried pile up
and try to disappear again

subtitles.original: 消えようとしても
subtitles.english: Even if it tries to disappear

subtitles.original: 離さないから
subtitles.english: Because I won't let go

subtitles.original: 消えようとしても
subtitles.english: Even if it tries to disappear

subtitles.original: 離さないから
subtitles.english: Because I won't let go

subtitles.original:
ninelie
Lyrics・Music: 澤野弘之
subtitles.english:
ninelie
Lyrics・Music: Hiroyuki Sawano

subtitles.original: 君を繋ぐ空の星が一つ　音を立てても
subtitles.english:
Even if one star in the sky
that connects you makes a sound

subtitles.original: どれも同じ雨に濡れた夢ばかり　乾くだけの鼓動
subtitles.english:
Every single one is a dream drenched in the same rain,
a heartbeat that only withers

subtitles.original: 相手をなぞる答えに疲れた
subtitles.english:
I'm tired of the answers
that trace my partner

subtitles.original: 繰り返す言い訳に崩れた朝
subtitles.english:
A morning that crumbled
into repeating excuses

subtitles.original: 掴めないデイドリーム　手をくれたストーリーと
subtitles.english:
An unreachable daydream,
with the story that lent a hand

subtitles.original: 栄光が何処へ　叫び唱えても
subtitles.english:
No matter how much I shout and chant
where the glory went

subtitles.original: 荒れたZoneは前も潜れない
subtitles.english: I can't even dive into the rough Zone anymore

subtitles.original: だからSilence　灯すThe melody
subtitles.english: So, Silence, the melody that lights up

subtitles.original: そっと歯車のように嵌まるピースが　疼こうとしても
subtitles.english:
Even if the pieces that fit like gears
quietly try to ache

subtitles.original: 絵もない偽りと同じ　黄昏に並ぶだけの証
subtitles.english:
The same as a pictureless lie,
evidence that only lines up in the twilight

subtitles.original: 箱の中に揃えた苛立ち
subtitles.english: Irritation gathered inside a box

subtitles.original: 順番待ちさらし　誤魔化しの鼓動
subtitles.english:
Exposed while waiting in line,
a heartbeat of deception
